    • Overview: See above.
    • Azure Search: Detail how Microsoft utilizes multiple Chaos levels (low, medium, high) to categorize and inform severity and actionability of failures within the Azure Search systems.
    • WazMonkey: Provide details on WazMonkey, an alternative to Chaos Monkey specifically designed for testing resiliency within Azure cloud services.
